title: minecraft1.6.2 载入地图出错
author: 蛋蛋zz
txt_content:
forge mod loader has found ID mismatches           comeplete details are in the log file
          ID 100 is mismatched between world and game
ID 100 is mismatched between world and game
ID 115 is mismatched between world and game
ID 99 is mismatched between world and game
ID 52 is mismatched between world and game
ID 59 is mismatched between world and game
ID 104 is mismatched between world and game
ID 105 is mismatched between world and game这是是什么错误，点确定会进去。但是担心联机出现bug或者崩溃。新人求解

replies.author: w2616071
replies.txt_content: 以前装了MOD  然后你删除了 点确定吧 没事的 单机的话下次就不会出现 多人的话这个报错会一直存在 但是不影响

replies.author: 蛋蛋zz
replies.txt_content:
w2616071 发表于 2013-9-24 14:38 
以前装了MOD  然后你删除了 点确定吧 没事的 单机的话下次就不会出现 多人的话这个报错会一直存在 但是不影 ...
谢谢.。。。。。。。。。。。
